    public class Parameters
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Parameters>
    Encapsulates the parameters of an IIIF request.
    See Also:
    IIIF Image API 2.0

      • isRequestingUnmodifiedSource

        public boolean isRequestingUnmodifiedSource()
        Returns:
        Whether the parameters are effectively requesting the unmodified source image, i.e. whether they specify full region, full scale, 0 rotation, no mirroring, default or color quality, and the same output format as the source format.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        IIIF URI parameters with no leading slash.
